title: Get some automation going with Rules on your Pixel – Here’s how
content:
Many an Android phone have hidden features that don’t get the limelight all too often. One of these features, in my opinion, is Rules. What are they? Well, let’s dig in and find out how to use Rules on the Pixel.

more…

The post Get some automation going with Rules on your Pixel – Here’s how appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Google's Pixel has a neat little feature called Rules. Rules has the potential to automate some of your life and make it that much easier.
